license:
# Overview

DokuWiki is wiki software mainly aimed at creating documentation of any kind.
It is targeted at developer teams, workgroups and small companies. It
has a simple but powerful syntax which makes sure the datafiles remain
readable outside the wiki and eases the creation of structured texts.
data is stored in plain text files -- no database is required.

Go to <https://www.dokuwiki.org/> for more information.

# Usage

To use the service simply deploy the charm:

    juju deploy dokuwiki

Expose the charm with `juju expose dokuwiki` then you can then browse to 
http://ip-address to view the wiki. Use `juju status` to find the address.

## Scale out Usage

The Dokuwiki charm implements the website interface and you can use a proxy or
loadbalancer to help with high traffic.

# Configuration

There are no configuration options for dokuwiki in juju, just deploy the service
and you are set!

# Contact Information

The dokuwiki charm was originally created by Bilal Akhtar <bilalakhtar@ubuntu.com>
The DokuWiki software was developed by the DokuWiki Community <http://www.dokuwiki.org>

## DokuWiki Information

- [DokuWiki website](https://www.dokuwiki.org/)
- DokuWiki uses [Github issues](https://github.com/splitbrain/dokuwiki/issues) for bug tracking. Please report all bugs and feature requests there. 
- [DokuWiki Development](https://www.dokuwiki.org/development)
- [DokuWiki user forum](https://forum.dokuwiki.org/)
